name: ABOVE THE CLOUDS - 3
description:
THE BREACH. A TENSION BETWEEN SHARDS POINTING FROM THE WALLS, THE NECESSARY BREAKAWAY, THE STEP TOWARDS A PROMISING AFTER. BUT THE MOMENT, THE PRESENT, IS NOT VICTORIOUS, A TRANSITORY LEAP, A VOID MADE FROM THE DETONATION AND THE BREATH. STRIKING OUT THE ORDER.

THE WILL OF A RUN AWAY. ESCAPING FROM THE INTOLERANT PRESENT. FIGHTING AGAINST ABRASIVE WALLS. FOLLOWING THE LIGHT SHINING THROUGH THE BOUNDARIES’ CRACKS. MAKING YOUR PATH AS BRIGHT AS THE EDGE OF A DAY. THE LUMINOUS BREAKTHROUGH BORN OF IMPACT ACTS AS A SACRED WAY.

BEING ONE STEP CLOSER TO THE HORIZON, PUSHING LIMITS AND BURNING FAITH. 
TAKING THE CHANCE TO CHANGE INTO SOMETHING YOU DON'T KNOW YET, A NEED OF MUTATION, BLOWING OUT OF A SHELL. EMBRACING LIBERTY AS A NEW DIRECTION. BALANCING YOUR ENERGY BETWEEN DEFINING YOUR FRONTIERS AND BREAKING THEM. 
CRAWL, SLIDE, DRAG YOURSELF, FADE, EVAPORATE, SUBLIMATE. CHANGING YOUR STANCE. SHIFTING REQUIRES LETTING YOURSELF EXPLODE AND COLLAPSE, AGAIN. BEING IN MOTION INVOLVE CROSSING BORDERS OTHERWISE IT IS ONLY DRIFTING AWAY AND NOT A JOURNEY ANYMORE.
